page.title: 05NORTHOLT AERODROME
page.content:
The {AERODROME }is North of Western Avenue. It takes up a lot of room in {NORTHOLT. { { R.A.F. } Flying began at {NORTHOLT}in March,{ 1915. It is the longest serving RAF station. It played an important role in the Second World War.
{ U.S. FORCES.} At. present there are U.S. Navy facilities in a part of the Base. The American forces have long been a part of the local community.
{MEMORIAL} Just outside the base is the {POLISH {WAR MEMORIAL }to the Polish flyers stationed at Northolt during the Second World War.
